name: Monologue (KEAYGAMES)
description:
Monologue: you play as a mad schizophrenic patient who believes to be trapped inside a sci-filab which is full of drones and enemies that try to attack him.

Controls 

Z to shoot

X to melee

Up to Jump

A and D to move

Game assets - FoozleCC and Ansimuz

Game Font - monogram

This game is constantly being updated and work in progress
